title: Mirepoix
description: Frankie hates Joe as soon as she meets him. It doesn’t matter that he is tall, dark, and handsome. Or how good he smells. Or how strong his arms are Or that he has tattoos she wants to lick He wants to be a celebrity chef and live in the spotlight. She wants to hide in the shadows Where it’s safe with her fellow misfits. It could never work with him… right?  *** Warning contains explicit sexual content and adult language. Not intended for readers under 18 ***
author: Paige Conners
